entry.tran: 眼尖的;目光敏锐的;观察入微的
entry.def: A sharp-eyed person is good at noticing and observing things.

example.ex: A sharp-eyed shop assistant spotted the fake.
example.tran: 一个眼尖的售货员发现了假货。

sentences.sentence: "quick-sighted into the faults of the time"- Leonard Bacon
